content:
Insurance Summer '22 Release Notes

Take advantage of commercial lines with commercial quoting and policy management. Simplify renewal setup with dedicated services for seamless policy renewals. Manage claims more efficiently with improved workflows and user experiences. Route work to teams with claims routing and tracking enhancements. Get one unified data model for all carriers with the updated Group Insurance data model.

Add All Types of Claim Participants Directly to Claims
Apply Policy Limits Directly to Claimed Amounts
Configure Grandchild Insured Item Coverages
Gain Insight into the Financial Impact of Claim Recoveries
Group Benefits Data Harmonization
Keep Track of Claim Team Member Roles
Manage Complex Quotes and Policies with Commercial Quoting and...
Route Claims to the Appropriate Team Members
Save Time While Adding Involved Items to a Claim

Services for Insurance Summer '22
Data Model Updates for Insurance Summer '22
Data Model Updates for Insurance FSC Summer '22
Document Generation For Vlocity Insurance Summer '22
Vlocity Insurance Application Suite Summer '22 Release
Insurance Summer '22 Minor Releases, Fixes, and Known Issues

Add All Types of Claim Participants Directly to Claims: Add any claim participant to a claim regardless of the participant’s role or involvement.
Apply Policy Limits Directly to Claimed Amounts: Automatically apply currency limits to claimed amounts for smoother payment processing.
Configure Grandchild Insured Item Coverages: Add and configure coverages at the grandchild level for custom quotes and policies.
Gain Insight into the Financial Impact of Claim Recoveries: Give team members a quick view of pending and actual claim recoveries.
Group Benefits Data Harmonization: Update Vlocity Health and Insurance to use standard group benefits objects and fields.
Keep Track of Claim Team Member Roles: Track who’s doing what with the Claim Team Member object.
Manage Complex Quotes and Policies with Commercial Quoting and...: Easily view, configure, reprice, and navigate complex quotes and policies with multi-level insured item relationships and coverages.
Route Claims to the Appropriate Team Members: Use skills-based and queue-based routing for claims, claim coverages, claim recoveries, and payment requests.
Save Time While Adding Involved Items to a Claim: Choose from a list of items or vehicles covered by the policy and enter only specific details.
title: Vlocity Insurance Summer 2022 Release Notes
